name: TableTalk
0:
”Alexa, Table Talk”
”Alexa, Start Table Talk”
”Alexa, Open Table Talk”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: table talk
des:
Table Talk is an Alexa Skill that randomly chooses a topic/question for your group to talk about. New topics added weekly.

If app is used, new features will be release, such as topic categories (Kids, Adults, Couple, Sports, Movies, etc).

To use: Alexa, Table Talk or Alexa, Start Table Talk
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
